content: Career Asked by AnonymousAsked on 01 Apr 2019How should be a diploma holder with 3 years of experience should get paid?The salary guides online seem to be catered to degree holders. Would like to understand the market rate to know if I am underpaid.1 answerAnswerBump0

Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered on 01 Apr 2019It would depend on your industry as well. But probably about 10-20% lesser than a degree holder? So if a degree holder is making 3k. You should be asking for around 2.4-2.7k. Just a rough estimate of course.0 comments0
